fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

GoogleAnalyticsAdminV1alphaGoogleAdsLink.description: A link between a GA4 property and a Google Ads account.

adsPersonalizationEnabled.description: Enable personalized advertising features with this integration. Automatically publish my Google Analytics audience lists and Google Analytics remarketing events/parameters to the linked Google Ads account. If this field is not set on create/update, it will be defaulted to true.

canManageClients.description: Output only. If true, this link is for a Google Ads manager account.

createTime.description: Output only. Time when this link was originally created.

creatorEmailAddress.description: Output only. Email address of the user that created the link. An empty string will be returned if the email address can't be retrieved.

name.description: Output only. Format: properties/{propertyId}/googleAdsLinks/{googleAdsLinkId} Note: googleAdsLinkId is not the Google Ads customer ID.

updateTime.description: Output only. Time when this link was last updated.

$block: A link between a GA4 property and a Google Ads account.

$ul: **adsPersonalizationEnabled**: Enable personalized advertising features with this integration. Automatically publish my Google Analytics audience lists and Google Analytics remarketing events/parameters to the linked Google Ads account. If this field is not set on create/update, it will be defaulted to true.
**canManageClients**: Output only. If true, this link is for a Google Ads manager account.
**createTime**: Output only. Time when this link was originally created.
**creatorEmailAddress**: Output only. Email address of the user that created the link. An empty string will be returned if the email address can't be retrieved.
**name**: Output only. Format: properties/{propertyId}/googleAdsLinks/{googleAdsLinkId} Note: googleAdsLinkId is not the Google Ads customer ID.
**updateTime**: Output only. Time when this link was last updated.
